meanings.sent1: The dyskinetic of his arm made it hard for him to write.
meanings.sent2: The patient's dyskinetic was evident in his unsteady gait.
meanings.sent3: The dyskinetic of the robot dance routine was unintentionally hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her dyskinetic on the dance floor resembled a puppet with tangled strings.
meanings.sent5: The dyskinetic of the old clock's hands made it seem alive.

meanings.sent1: The dyskinetic movements of his fingers were uncontrollable.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with dyskinetic twitches in her face muscles.
meanings.sent3: The dyskinetic squirrel darted around the park in a frenzy.
meanings.sent4: The dyskinetic branches of the tree swayed wildly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: His dyskinetic gestures made it hard for others to understand him.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or affected by dyskinesia
meanings.sent1: The dyskinetic symptoms were a result of the medication.
meanings.sent2: She experienced dyskinetic side effects after starting the new treatment.
meanings.sent3: The dyskinetic reaction to the food was unexpected but temporary.
meanings.sent4: His dyskinetic response to stress was concerning to his family.
meanings.sent5: The dyskinetic nature of the disorder made daily tasks challenging.
